metadata.title: CVE-2024-57661 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in the sqlo_df component of openlink virtuoso-opensource v7.2.11allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via crafted SQLstatements.

criterions.comment: virtuoso-opensource package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
